Overview  Service   Command 

Service: zimbraVoice
Namespace: "urn:zimbraVoice"
ChangeUCPassword SOAP Command

Update Zimbra's stored value of the password for unified communications

Authorization token required true
Admin Authorization token required false

ChangeUCPasswordRequest

    <ChangeUCPasswordRequest password="{password}" /> ## ChangeUCPasswordRequest

The following table describes elements and attributes you can define within a <ChangeUCPasswordRequest> element:

XPath Required / Optional Description
@password Required (only 1) Type:String
Updated Password

ChangeUCPasswordResponse

    <ChangeUCPasswordResponse /> ## ChangeUCPasswordResponse
